com.appscend.media.renderers.exoPlayerRenderers

Class ExoPlayerInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appscend.media.renderers.exoPlayerRenderers.ExoPlayerInterface

  • public class ExoPlayerInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper around ExoPlayer that provides a higher level interface. It can be prepared with one of a number of ExoPlayerInterface.RendererBuilder classes to suit different use cases (e.g. DASH, SmoothStreaming and so on).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ExoPlayerInterface.CaptionListener
      A listener for receiving notifications of timed text.
      static interface  ExoPlayerInterface.Id3MetadataListener
      A listener for receiving ID3 metadata parsed from the media stream.
      static interface  ExoPlayerInterface.InfoListener
      A listener for debugging information.
      static interface  ExoPlayerInterface.InternalErrorListener
      A listener for internal errors.
      static interface  ExoPlayerInterface.Listener
      A listener for core events.
      static interface  ExoPlayerInterface.RendererBuilder
      Builds renderers for the player.
